REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0219 reute r f BC-GROWTH-STOCK-OUTLOOK 04-17 0040

TEXT.TITLE: GROWTH STOCK OUTLOOK <GSO> ASSET VALUE UP
TEXT.BODY: Growth Stock Outlook Trust Inc said its asset value as of March 31 was 141.4 mln dlrs or 9.83 dlrs per share, up from 117.3 mln dlrs or 9.38 dlrs per share a year earlier. Reuter
